Table oms.Shop2PaymentProvider2PaymentDefDO

Payment providers and payment method that should be used by a shop

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id bigint PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
ShopDO shopRef bigint NOT_NULL The shop the payment provider and payment method should be used for.

PaymentDefDO paymentDefRef integer NOT_NULL The payment method that should be used.
